sn12.49:1.5: Kismiṁ sati saṅkhārā honti, kismiṁ sati viññāṇaṁ hoti → etthantare pāṭho si, sya-all potthakesu natthi. tathā sati anantarasuttaṭīkāya
sn12.49:2.2: imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti … → etthantare pāṭho si, sya-all potthakesu natthi. tathā sati anantarasuttaṭīkāya
sn12.49:3.4: Kismiṁ asati saṅkhārā na honti, kismiṁ asati viññāṇaṁ na hoti → etthantare pāṭhopi tattha tatheva
sn12.49:4.2: imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti … → etthantare pāṭhopi tattha tatheva
